member.name: D3D12_RESIDENCY_FLAGS
member.summary: Used with the EnqueuMakeResident function to choose how residency operations proceed when the memory budget is exceeded.

member.name: D3D12_RESIDENCY_FLAGS.D3D12_RESIDENCY_FLAG_NONE
member.summary: Specifies the default residency policy, which allows residency operations to succeed regardless of the application's current memory budget. EnqueueMakeResident returns E_OUTOFMEMORY only when there is no memory available.

member.name: D3D12_RESIDENCY_FLAGS.D3D12_RESIDENCY_FLAG_DENY_OVERBUDGET
member.summary: Specifies that the EnqueueMakeResident function should return E_OUTOFMEMORY when the residency operation would exceed the application's current memory budget.
